languages.text: {n}Эдельтрад тонко улыбается.{/n} "Прискорбно видеть, что представитель {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Экклезиархии{/g} не видит грани между заблудшими душами и откровенными еретиками, чья участь — гореть в очищающем пламени {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Его{/g}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Эдельтрад тонко улыбается.{/n} "Прискорбно видеть, что представитель {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Экклезиархии{/g} не видит грани между заблудшими душами и откровенными еретиками, чья участь — гореть в очищающем пламени {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Его{/g}".

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad smiles faintly.{/n} "It is lamentable to see a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g} fail to perceive the line between lost souls and outright heretics, whose destiny is to burn in {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}His{/g} purifying flames."
languages.original_text: {n}Эдельтрад тонко улыбается.{/n} "Прискорбно видеть, что представитель {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Экклезиархии{/g} не видит грани между заблудшими душами и откровенными еретиками, чья участь — гореть в очищающем пламени {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Его{/g}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Edelthrad smiles faintly.{/n} "It is lamentable to see a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g} failing to perceive the line between lost souls and outright heretics whose destiny is to burn in {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}His{/g} purifying flames."

{n}Edelthrad smiles faintly.{/n} "It is lamentable to see a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g} failing to perceive the line between lost souls and outright heretics whose destiny is to burn in {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}His{/g} purifying flames."

{n}Edelthrad smiles faintly.{/n} "It is lamentable to see a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g} fail to perceive the line between lost souls and outright heretics, whose destiny is to burn in {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}His{/g} purifying flames."

{n}Edelthrad smiles faintly.{/n} "It is lamentable to see a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g} fail to perceive the line between lost souls and outright heretics, whose destiny is to burn in {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}His{/g} purifying flames."

{n}Edelthrad smiles faintly.{/n} "It is lamentable to see a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g} fail to perceive the line between lost souls and outright heretics, whose destiny is to burn in {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}His{/g} purifying flames."

languages.text: {n}艾德萨德淡淡地笑了笑。{/n}“身为{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}国教{/g}的成员，却没能分辨出哪些人是迷途的羔羊，哪些人是彻头彻尾的异端分子，这实在是太可悲了。那些异端分子就该在{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}祂{/g}净化的烈焰中灰飞烟灭。”
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad smiles faintly.{/n} "It is lamentable to see a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g} fail to perceive the line between lost souls and outright heretics, whose destiny is to burn in {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}His{/g} purifying flames."

traits.locale_text: {n}艾德萨德淡淡地笑了笑。{/n}“身为{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}国教{/g}的成员，却没能分辨出哪些人是迷途的羔羊，哪些人是彻头彻尾的异端分子，这实在是太可悲了。那些异端分子就该在{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}祂{/g}净化的烈焰中灰飞烟灭。”

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad sonríe levemente.{/n} «Es una lástima ver cómo un{mf||a} miembro de la {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Eclesiarquía{/g} no logra distinguir almas descarriadas de herejes cuyo destino es arder en {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}su{/g} fuego purificador».
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad smiles faintly.{/n} "It is lamentable to see a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g} fail to perceive the line between lost souls and outright heretics, whose destiny is to burn in {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}His{/g} purifying flames."

traits.locale_text: {n}Edelthrad sonríe levemente.{/n} «Es una lástima ver cómo un{mf||a} miembro de la {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Eclesiarquía{/g} no logra distinguir almas descarriadas de herejes cuyo destino es arder en {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}su{/g} fuego purificador».

languages.text: {n}エデルスラドは、かすかにほほえむ。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}帝国聖教会{/g}の一員が、迷える魂と、{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神{/g}の浄化の炎で燃やされる運命にある完全な異端者の境界線がわからないとは実に嘆かわしいことだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad smiles faintly.{/n} "It is lamentable to see a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g} fail to perceive the line between lost souls and outright heretics, whose destiny is to burn in {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}His{/g} purifying flames."

traits.locale_text: {n}エデルスラドはかすかにほほえむ。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}帝国聖教会{/g}のメンバーが、迷える魂と、{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神{/g}の浄化の炎で燃やされる運命にある完全な異端者の境界線を見ることができないとは嘆かわしいことだ」
{n}エデルスラドは、かすかにほほえむ。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}帝国聖教会{/g}の一員が、迷える魂と、{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神{/g}の浄化の炎で燃やされる運命にある完全な異端者の境界線がわからないとは実に嘆かわしいことだ」

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad sourit légèrement.{/n} « Quelle tristesse de constater qu'{mf|un|une} membre de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclésiarchie{/g} est incapable de faire la distinction entre de simples âmes égarées et de véritables hérétiques, voués à brûler dans les flammes purificatrices de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad smiles faintly.{/n} "It is lamentable to see a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g} fail to perceive the line between lost souls and outright heretics, whose destiny is to burn in {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}His{/g} purifying flames."

traits.locale_text: {n}Edelthrad sourit légèrement.{/n} « Quelle tristesse de constater qu'{mf|un|une} membre de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclésiarchie{/g} est incapable de faire la distinction entre de simples âmes égarées et de véritables hérétiques, voués à brûler dans les flammes purificatrices de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g}. »

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad lächelt schwach.{/n} "Es ist bedauernswert, wenn ein Mitglied der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ekklesiarchie{/g} die Linie zwischen verlorenen Seelen und Ketzern nicht sieht, deren Schicksal {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Seine{/g} reinigenden Flammen sind."
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad smiles faintly.{/n} "It is lamentable to see a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g} fail to perceive the line between lost souls and outright heretics, whose destiny is to burn in {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}His{/g} purifying flames."

traits.locale_text: {n}Edelthrad lächelt schwach.{/n} "Es ist bedauernswert, wenn ein Mitglied der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ekklesiarchie{/g} die Linie zwischen verlorenen Seelen und Ketzern nicht sieht, deren Schicksal {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Seine{/g} reinigenden Flammen sind."

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad hafifçe gülümsüyor.{/n} "Bir {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ekleşiarşi{/g} mensubunun, yitik ruhlar ile kaderleri {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}O'nun{/g} arındırıcı ateşinde yanmak olan bariz kâfirler arasındaki çizgiyi algılayamaması acı."
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad smiles faintly.{/n} "It is lamentable to see a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g} fail to perceive the line between lost souls and outright heretics, whose destiny is to burn in {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}His{/g} purifying flames."

traits.locale_text: {n}Edelthrad hafifçe gülümsüyor.{/n} Bir {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ekleşiarşi{/g} mensubunun, yitik ruhlar ile kaderleri {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}O{/g}'nun arındırıcı ateşinde yanmak olan bariz kâfirler arasındaki çizgiyi algılayamaması acı."

languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad smiles faintly.{/n} "It is lamentable to see a member of the Ecclesiarchy fail to perceive the line between lost souls and outright heretics, whose destiny is to burn in His purifying flames."
